column4: anyone know why when I press the ctrl key in a window I get a little hand that lets me move the window around ... how do I fix it so that I can make it select multiple items
the alt- key here moves the windows.. not ctrl.
that may be so  but on my system the ctrl key is doing it
i would guess off hand that if you are using compiz, its some how reversed the keys. or something else has reversed the ctrl and alt keys.
